#summary HowTo flash the WebRadio bootloader and firmware.
#labels Featured

=== Program the Bootloader ===
 # Flash the loader binary to the flash start address *0x0000*.

=== Program a new Firmware with the Bootloader ===
 # Copy the firmware binary to the root directory of the memory card and rename it to *FIRMWARE.BIN*.
 # Power off the WebRadio .
 # Hold the rotary encoder switch while power on the WebRadio.
 # Select in the loader menu *Flash /FIRMWARE.BIN*.

You can also load a new firmware via JTAG, when you program it to the flash start address *0x5000*. (The bootloader can be up to 20kByte.)
